tv.ux1.resource.affiliate
Class AffiliateResource

java.lang.Object
  tv.ux1.resource.Resource
      tv.ux1.resource.affiliate.AffiliateResource

public class AffiliateResource
extends Resource

Copyright 2012: ux1.tv

Returns information about the Affiliate Programs that are serviced by this API. Current plans are to support Google Affiliate Network (gan), Amazon (amazon), and Commission Junction (cj)

public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getAffiliate(java.lang.String affiliateShortName)

createAffiliateProgram

public javax.ws.rs.core.Response createAffiliateProgram(AffiliateProgram affiliateProgram)
Creates a new Affiliate Program when the short name is known.

Parameters:
affiliateProgram - An AffiliatePorgram instance.

The shortName values are as follows:

  • gan - Google Affiliate Network
  • amazon - Amazon Associates
  • cj - Commission Junction
Returns:
an Affiliate Program JSON object
